title: Leading Boutique Hotel Hotel Amira Istanbul Announces Amenity Offering Mobile WiFi Router to Guests for Use Anywhere in Istanbul
text:
It's not uncommon for a quality hotel to offer free WiFi services to guests. Acclaimed Istanbul boutique hotel Hotel Amira Istanbul has gone far beyond this amenity, recently announcing they are offering guests use of a mobile WiFi router which allows them to get WiFi throughout all of Istanbul, a place where internet fees can be extreme.
October 14, 2015
Hotel Amira Istanbul has a well-earned reputation as one of Turkey's finest hotels, in quality of rooms, service and location, being recognized internationally for these qualities. Recently, in an effort to expand their amenities even further and help deliver more value to guests, the hotel announced they are offering a free mobile WiFi router to people who stay with them, meaning they will not only have free WiFi in their rooms and elsewhere at the hotel, but also throughout Istanbul. In a city where WiFi can be quite expensive this service will clearly save many people significant amounts of money.
“We are always exploring adding new ways to make our guests stay at Hotel Amira Istanbul more special,” commented Mr. Kamer Toker, coordinator of the Hotel Amira Istanbul. “We know having the mobile WiFi router is a really incredible benefit for people visiting Istanbul. Our guests have really responded with enthusiasm.”
According to Hotel Amira Istanbul, some of the other amenities they are very happy to offer, in the rooms, include: air conditioning, an iPhone docking stocking, a LCD-TV, free cable, 24 hour room service, and a laptop sized safe.
Hotel Amira Istanbul is located near many of the city's most spectacular sights and attractions, like the Hagia Sophia, the world famous Blue Mosque, the mystic Basilica Cistern, the Topkapi Palace and the Grand Bazaar, which no visitor to the city would want to miss.
For more information or to book a room be sure to visit http://www.hotelamira.com
